name: That One Time We Went Out For Bubble Tea
name_original: That One Time We Went Out For Bubble Tea
description:
"That One Time We Went Out For Bubble Tea" is an interactive story based on true events which took place on August 6th 2020.

During this day, my family and I decided to go out for some Boba only to get T-boned by a car. 

Made for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story  game jam.
